website_summaries.verdict: This keyboard starter pack contains everything a child needs to get playing.
pros: This basic 49-key keyboard is just the right size for kids to handle
Keyboard is animated, making it kid-friendly
Comes with a USB cable, so you can attach it to your computer to use the included interactive instructional CD-ROM
cons: The keyboard is of poorer quality than others at a similar price

customer_reviews.title: Greatest piano starter kit!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME first time piano kit for anyone in the family. My 6-year-old loves playing this and LEARNING how to do it correctly. Great buy for sure! What's even better... you can plug in HEADPHONES so you don't have to hear them as they practice if you have other things going on or need some quiet time while they're still playing. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jill H

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used the computer program but kiddo loves changing the note sounds and using it with headphones. I debated on others and I'm really happy with this. I was concerned because the box doesn't have much protecting padding and they shipped it in a box with no padding at all. It wasn't damaged and plays but I kept the packaging for a bit to make sure it wasn't all damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great for any age
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 4 year old for Christmas and he absolutely loves it - it is now 4 months later and he knows all of the "black" keys by name. Excellent teaching tool and interactive online music. Thank you for such an incredible teaching tool.
customer_reviews.author: T. Ham

customer_reviews.title: Everything described.
customer_reviews.text: Everything described. My only negative criticism lies in the provided instruction manual. The instructions, especially regarding settings/changing settings, have a little to be desired. As far as the function of the keyboard, my critique is all positive. The sound is full and beautiful. All the different tones and rhythms provide endless combinations for the curious and experimental young (and old) minds. Great keyboard!!! The unit is light and easily mobile even for the intended little hands.
customer_reviews.author: SUE7RN

customer_reviews.title: Great starter keyboard
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son just started piano lessons and so this was the perfect gift from Santa. There's a CD that comes along with it and teaches you each step of the way. We haven't gone through all of the lessons yet, but when I tell him it's time to practice, he comes running. The keys are just perfect for his little fingers. I suspect as we move further along in the lessons, he'll enjoy it even more.
customer_reviews.author: Superhero's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Pack!
customer_reviews.text: Our four year old is LOVING this Piano Starter Pack! The instructions are easy to follow along and entertaining. She has been practicing for a couple weeks and hasn't gotten bored. The quality is excellent. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: EdnCity

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Starter Piano for young child
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift for our grandson to encourage him to take an interest in music at an early age. Music & Arts are so important for a child that we felt this would be a great starter piano for him. When it arrived, my husband tried it out. It's not a toy, yet not quite an actual piano, but it's very nice for the money. My husband said he wanted one (lol). Great value for the price. We're impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly G

customer_reviews.title: love it for my granddaughter who is driving her mother ...
customer_reviews.text: I. love it for my granddaughter who is driving her mother to drink with her renditions.
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 yr old daughter for Christmas and she loves it! Very simple to follow teaching techniques and video. She is able to follow along with the instructions and enjoys using all of the added options on the keyboard. Seems to be well made and came with all of the listed items. Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Swanson

customer_reviews.title: A great keyboard to start with for learning to play
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9 year old son and he's having a lot of fun with it. Sounds really good and has a lot of great features. Pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: momofsporefan

customer_reviews.title: The dimensions listed on Amazon are incorrect. It is ...
customer_reviews.text: The dimensions listed on Amazon are incorrect. It is Actually 26" L NOT 35" L, Big Error! I had to repurchase the keyboard stand so that it would fit this keyboard. Please correct this for future customers! I have not had time yet to check out the quality of this keyboard, as it is a gift for my granddaughter, but I'm trusting it is just what it says it is.
customer_reviews.author: Lanie

customer_reviews.title: Good piano for kids
customer_reviews.text: Good piano for kids. It's a bit expensive for what you get. We got it for our 2 and 4 yr old. The 2yr old will play with it but it's really meant for older kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Very good product! This is the one to get.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with everything we got. Happy with the price because it is a quality piece with great sound. Record and playback feature, two teaching disks and any book. My child has taught herself several songs completely on her own.
customer_reviews.author: kiddiefondue

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this piano! She got it for a Christmas gift. She plays it all the time! We have not encountered any issues at all, works great!
customer_reviews.author: RLOgden

customer_reviews.title: ) it was dirty, and broke within a week
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas and I wish I never had! It was used ( even though I checked again after I had received it & it had said NEW!) it was dirty, and broke within a week! It was cheaply made and I was very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive, unimpressive
customer_reviews.text: Basically a cheap casio keyboard bundled with software that looks like it was created 20 years ago. It's a shame this product isn't better made or at the very least, cheaper, because there isn't many things on the market to fill this need. The interactivity between the computer and keyboard is under utilized. You'd be better off buying your kid a toy piano from walmart and borrowing an instructional DVD from the library. Very disappointed with this product. I only wish I had returned it before it was too late.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old and 8 year old both love this Piano and we haven't hooked it up to ...
customer_reviews.text: 5 year old and 8 year old both love this Piano and we haven't hooked it up to a PC yet
customer_reviews.author: Zippy the Pinhead

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product
customer_reviews.text: DID NOT WORK. We opened the box and NONE of the buttons above the keys work *AT ALL*. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: deborah agnes henry

customer_reviews.title: Lots of musical fun!
customer_reviews.text: The size and sound quality is pretty great and there are so many features. We can't wait to try out the software and get our 6 year old learning how to play. I think the whole family will have fun with this little keyboard!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it. It does take an adult to figure ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. It does take an adult to figure out what the keyboard can do. My grand babies just enjoyed access to keys that they can actually play with ease Good price!
customer_reviews.author: D.Jameson

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: After only 3 short months of MINIMAL PLAY the keyboard stopped working. Just like that. $70 later and it is going in the garbage. VERY DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Simpe with lots of stuff
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. We havent used the software yet. There are a lot of songs and tunes. It seems to be missing some of the main songs that you would find on any other keyboard (fur elise???). just changed it from 5 to 4 stars because of that.,
customer_reviews.author: J. Buttler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it. Playing a song within an hour of opening it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Soze

customer_reviews.title: Just Right!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my six year old granddaughter with fingers crossed, hoping that it would be more than hype. Grandpa scored big on this one! Her immediate reaction was to bring it to the dinner table, bring it to bed, and she wanted to take it in the bathtub (NOT!). As time has gone on she is getting into the lessons more than just fooling around with the novelty of making "fun sounds". All in all a great purchase. Kudos to Amazon for their great service and to the company that produced this super device.
customer_reviews.author: W. LaRue

customer_reviews.title: My 7-year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Got our 7 year old son this kit for Christmas! He loves it! We love it for the lessons included and the song book. Easy to learn, step-by-step teaching makes it even better! Highly recommend. Great price for the quality too!
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish it came with a stand but other than that it is exactly what my daughter needed.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Fray

customer_reviews.title: Child loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old loves it. Very easy for a child to use
customer_reviews.author: Cindy R. Frazier

customer_reviews.title: My 6-yr-old is learning very quickly using the online lessons!
customer_reviews.text: The piano is a little smaller than I envisioned (total width is 26 inches, keyboard is 22.5 inches), but it's very nice. Lots of options for different sounds, styles. We haven't even used a fraction of the features so far. But my daughter is doing the online lessons by herself, and is learning very quickly. Great way to start on our own time without paying for, and driving to lessons!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this keyboard. The computer software is good and allows my 10 year old to learn at her own pace. My younger kids enjoy the pre-programed tunes.
customer_reviews.author: Susan W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The grandchildren love this piano. I was surprised at how many settings it has. They can make music. Ty!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: daugther is learning and makes a great use for practice
customer_reviews.author: Jeorge Jesus Zepeda

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a friend
customer_reviews.text: A great learning tool and great way to start kids to enjoy music. Well worth the price. Compact for the little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Dude

customer_reviews.title: Piano delilght
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter loves this piano. She plays it everyday. Everyone is happy.
customer_reviews.author: MEC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love - my granddaughter has the best time and has actually learned from the instruction video.
customer_reviews.author: averagejoan

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: We haven't used the computer program with this yet, but the piano sounds great and my child really likes it. It does not sound or look like a toy.
customer_reviews.author: Traci A. Byrd

customer_reviews.title: grandaughter lover this
customer_reviews.text: I would have preferred getting something with a full sized keyboard, but momma dictated price range. Five year old granddaughter plays it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Jim G (Oregon)

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard to learn on!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old received this keyboard for Christmas and although he doesn't follow the lesson plans, although he probably would if I encouraged him to do so, he still has a lot of fun playing it and messing around with all of the many sounds and songs. His favorite thing to do is hook his ear buds up to it and make up songs. He's actually getting pretty good at that. Just a great product for adult or child who wants to learn to play the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M Goodell

customer_reviews.title: Great for 5 + yrs. so much fun and a good introduction to music in general.
customer_reviews.text: Our keyboard arrived safely & quickly. It's a brilliant product for Elementary kids. Great value too! We also bought the song book and my daughter picked it up really quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Clarke

customer_reviews.title: good for kids to learn how to play
customer_reviews.text: nice way to help kids learn quickly good cd with it and connecting to computer is cool when the tv is being used already.
customer_reviews.author: Giggle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for a grandchild. So far it is exactly what we had in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Lambma

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners (any age)
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for a 10 year old and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Jetblack84

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The extra DVD did not work and could not find the app for my tablet
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hodjat

customer_reviews.title: Works great, and she is already learning from the videos
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her piano. Works great, and she is already learning from the videos.
customer_reviews.author: Brittanie B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase for my 6 year old daughter! I only wish it had come with a stand.
customer_reviews.author: StabbingZombies

customer_reviews.title: eMedia My Piano Starter
customer_reviews.text: I received my item in acceptable time. For the price it is a good starter for any child and if music is a passion for them this piano can build quite a foundation for the musical ability.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy A. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Not complete
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was poor and came dented. It came with the original packaging. Also the AC adaptor was advertised by the box to be included. It wasn't. Therefore when my three year old grandson tried to play it on Christmas morning. He couldn't. I didn't purchase batteries as the battered box said they weren't needed.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S.

customer_reviews.title: Piano Starter Pack a Hit
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old grand daughter is thrilled with her piano and learning to play more easily and quickly than we expected.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Harala

customer_reviews.title: software doesn't work properly
customer_reviews.text: the keyboard is good for the price. the software looks good, but i can't get it to play the sound or video files. anyone know how to fix this?
customer_reviews.author: Jsull

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for beginners. Perfect for our 7 year old grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Marlanie B.

customer_reviews.title: Think long term
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our granddaughter little over a year ago and it just bit the dust...need another portable keyboard but wouldn't get this one again. Don't know if its made in China but it acts like it was. bummer
customer_reviews.author: Fred Fagaga

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Ugg the software is so outdated I could not get it to work with any of our computers.
customer_reviews.author: Molly DeVries

customer_reviews.title: Just right in price and size for an 8-year old newbie to the keys
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard was the right price and the right size to test our daughter's interest in learning to play. She is eight years old, and received it for Christmas. Once it came out of the box, she was immediately noodling around on it, and playing with the numerous sound effect features. We'll do our best to encourage her to stick with the self-paced lessons, but even if she doesn't, this doesn't break the bank. I'm finding it to be a lot of fun myself, so if she gives up maybe mom will take a crack at tickling the ivories. :-P
customer_reviews.author: Buffalo Shuffler

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product for my 5 year old little girl. She loves to sing and dance and sits with our pianist at church every Sunday then comes home and pretends to play her toy piano. The description made this software sound little kid friendly but when I opened it up and tried it out before telling the little one about it I was disappointed to see how difficult it was. The keyboard was nice and I would have kept it but the software was not a good starting place for us.
customer_reviews.author: EllAdd's Mom

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it.
customer_reviews.text: All that matter is that my son loves it. We are still learning. But he seems to be catching on better than me!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the piano for my grandson. He's not the recommend age of 5yrs old yet, but he likes trying to play it.The quality is very good for the price and once he does turn 5 I think this is something he will not out grow for many year (if the product last that long) and the sound is good. I looked at the DVD on my computer and TV the lessons are great. I believe with practice he will learn the basics of playing, however, the quality of the DVD needs to be better. For that reason I gave it four stars.I am very pleased with this product! I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: C. B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew and he loved it. For the price it does a lot and the sound isn't bad, especially for kids. The tutorials are very good, if you can get a 6 year old to sit for them! Would recommend it. He has fun with it and 'jamming' with his brother and uncles. Cord is a bit short-nothing an extension cord can't fix.
customer_reviews.author: M. S. Joyce

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used all the features or connected to my computer yet! but it has great sound and my toddler loves playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Toni O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 5 to 11 years old love this product. A lot fun and takes several hours to complete
customer_reviews.author: DWillard

customer_reviews.title: Not happy about this at all
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift and the box itself was damaged. Not happy about this at all. Associates at the warehouse need to be more aware of how the items condition is before sending it out.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: So far, we like it
customer_reviews.text: I got this product to begin the process of introducing our kids to the piano in a fun, more relaxed way- other than formal piano lessons. The kids like that you can start and stop the lessons any time you want. The reward for them is getting to free-play with the keyboard after the lesson. You can use headphones with it- BONUS! We haven't used it all that much yet, so I'll have to update my review later.
customer_reviews.author: HappyMomofThree

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Pointless if it doesnt come with the whole learning kit and connections.
customer_reviews.author: Stone Creek

customer_reviews.title: Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for Christmas and she loves it, we can hardly get her off of it! The teaching component is great!
customer_reviews.author: K. Ault

customer_reviews.title: Like this Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this keyboard. The smaller keys make it easier for them to play. My son started the lessons provided on the CD but he never really got far. It seemed like he was learning though. Pleanty of instrument sounds and sample songs on the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Paul V

customer_reviews.title: Great introduction to the world of sound processing and harmonics for the young especially for the young
customer_reviews.text: Little fingers are busy and this is a more realist representation of a larger unit and is for sure a great starter however as soon as possible I would go for the next step up and have a damper pedal {{:>)
customer_reviews.author: Alfred

customer_reviews.title: What every Child would Love
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is fantastic. Although I bought this as a Xmas gift for a 4 year old I am sure that her parents will have as much fun playing. Highly recommend product and as always Amazon can always be relied on to pack product extremely well (Australia) and I received prior to Xmas which was a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: I PLAY RELIGIOUSLY AND LOVE THIS KEYBOARD!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this rating of 5 stars becuase voice 90 with dsp no modulation or sustain sounds excellent! I'm an adult that decided to buy this keyboard that is made for kids and I wasnt disappointed! the voice even sounds good from a distance! If you are an adult like me you may find joy in that voice on this emedia keyboard made in 2010. It suits my needs for my religion orientated playing perfectly. Yours Truly, Michael E Litchmore
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Litchmore

customer_reviews.title: emedia my piano
customer_reviews.text: my granddaughter loves music and i just wanted to have something she could make her own with and drive her mom crazy
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Moore

customer_reviews.title: Best Starter Piano
customer_reviews.text: There is no reason a child cannot use this keyboard to start his piano lessons. Good for age 4 and up! Great strike and good sound quality. My grandson would be practicing on this if his parents had supported his interests. No excuse for lazy parents! If your kid has a good ear and loves music and wants to play the piano, then get with the program!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Happy custormer
customer_reviews.text: Thanks very much for your fast mailing, and it was packed very professional, I was so happy to see it on time as stated, it was a birthday gift for my grand daughter, she is turning four and she has not put it down yet and loves all the things she can do with the piano. We will be back soon. Thanks again, Brandyman
customer_reviews.author: Brandyman

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased this for Christmas 2015 for my 6 year old. She loved it! Then all the keys started breaking off. Very poor quality!
customer_reviews.author: Momof3girls

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts and previously owned!
customer_reviews.text: My kid just opened it and it had used stains with scratches on it, missing the AC adapter and a disk. I'm pissed!
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The item is good, but my daughter doesn't like it very much due to her poor English.
customer_reviews.author: Qixia Liu

customer_reviews.title: Save your money for lessons - made very poorly!
customer_reviews.text: While we wanted to love this product we were never able to use it. It sat in the box and when we finally took it out and opened it up for play it did not work, customer service refused to help since it was outside of the warranty. Never have I encountered such horrible customer service that would not even try to troubleshoot the problem with me!
customer_reviews.author: Missi Barry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an inside fort
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for an inside fort! Or out on the grass on a nice day. Not too big -not too small- just right for any kids six and under!
customer_reviews.author: J G.

customer_reviews.title: I hope you have better luck with the box not looking all beat up
customer_reviews.text: I really want to give this product five stars, because it deserves five stars. I would have even given it four stars, but the box that it came in was so messed up that I had to give it three stars. If you are going to purchase this piano, I hope you have better luck with the box not looking all beat up.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Overcharged :(
customer_reviews.text: It charged me then what the price said. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sharae Russell

customer_reviews.title: Too difficult for young children
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is too difficult to work as an instructional instrument. Also the keys are not true to piano key size and feel very "plasticy". It is also very small compared to regular keyboards. I did end up retuning it as I could not figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: I'm a ROCK STAR!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Words cannot describe how this has changed my life. I wrote a song the moment I opened the box that contained this gift from heaven. I call it "The Genie” because it made all my dreams come true. The Genie: Look at me and my rockin’ keyboard It’s making my dreams come true (dreams come true) Look at me tickling this ivory It’s making my dreams come so true (so incredibly true) Chorus: It’s the genie- and it grants three wishes And those wishes are awesome and rad Its my plastic genie, and it’s gonna help me rock better than Keith next door (because he’s a jerkface) GENIE ROCK!!! **20 minute keyboard solo** Repeat chorus
customer_reviews.author: Heather Tucker

product_meta.title: eMedia My Piano Starter Pack [Old Version, EK05103]
product_meta.description: Style:Kids Starter PackIntroducing the eMedia My Piano Starter Pack. This pack has everything your child needs to begin playing the piano: an electronic keyboard sized for small fingers, a power supply, and a USB cable for connecting the MIDI keyboard to your computer. The keyboard features built-in speakers and realistic sampled sounds. What's more, it comes with a great teacher, the new interactive eMedia My Piano CD-ROM (for Windows & Mac computers) for children ages 5 and up. eMedia My Piano Starter Pack now also comes with a bonus My Piano DVD. The award-winning eMedia My Piano educational software is what sets this keyboard Pack apart from all others. In eMedia My Piano an animated character named Pam the Piano leads kids through over 100 lessons, authored and demonstrated by Irma Irene Justicia, M.A., who has taught at the renowned Juilliard School of Music. eMedia My Piano covers basics such as proper hand and finger position, learning notes, counting rhythm, playing harmonies, and reading music. All this and more is taught with popular songs and melodies. The interactive games interspersed throughout the method make learning fun and easy.
feature_bullets: Fun easy keyboard teaching system for kids
Made for kids, 49-key "plug-n-play" keyboard with speakers & USB cord provided
Includes interactive My Piano CD-ROM & bonus DVD
Full-motion videos that guide kids through songs and playing techniques
Animated keyboard, digital recorder, metronome and over 100 software-based lessons

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
